posts.post_content:
This is a ridiculous uncommon. Outclasses both [Scion of the Wild](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Scion of the Wild) and [Keldon Warlord](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Keldon Warlord). and in white no less, that token swarm color...
  
   
Also, that damsel can crusade me anytime! :D

posts.post_content:
T1, [Champion of the Parish](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Champion of the Parish). T2 [Gather The Townsfolk](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Gather The Townsfolk). T3, Crusader. T4, [Odric, Master Tactician](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Odric, Master Tactician).  
You now swing for 12 unblockable on turn 4 or you take out whatever you feel like, cast increasing devotion on t5 and swing for lethal.  
And this is a simple synergy in Standard

Posted By: Hugomanen (7/15/2012 9:29:09 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Now wait just one minute.  
No way is this card "better" than [Scion of the Wild](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Scion of the Wild). Green has just as many good token cards as white, and Scion's cost is hardly more restrictive. Nothing in white can match a T3 [Scion of the Wild](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Scion of the Wild) followed by a T4 [Beacon of Creation](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Beacon of Creation). In fact, green can make the whole thing happen a turn earlier with [Llanowar Elves](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Llanowar Elves). Sure, this card will have some good plays with a T2 [Raise the Alarm](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Raise the Alarm)/[Gather the Townsfolk](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Gather the Townsfolk) and a T4 [Odric, Master Tactician](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Odric, Master Tactician)/[Captain's Call](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Captain's Call). But Scion is still the original (well, the original 3-mana \*/\*) and is still the best.
posts.html:
Now wait just one minute.
No way is this card "better" than Scion of the Wild. Green has just as many good token cards as white, and Scion's cost is hardly more restrictive. Nothing in white can match a T3 Scion of the Wild followed by a T4 Beacon of Creation. In fact, green can make the whole thing happen a turn earlier with Llanowar Elves. Sure, this card will have some good plays with a T2 Raise the Alarm/Gather the Townsfolk and a T4 Odric, Master Tactician/Captain's Call. But Scion is still the original (well, the original 3-mana */*) and is still the best.
